# Xmldoc Docs

## XML Comment Tags

- [XML Comment Tags](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/index.md): Learn more about: Recommended XML Tags for Documentation Comments (Visual Basic)
- [<c>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/c.md): Learn more about: <c> (Visual Basic)
- [<code>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/code.md): Learn more about: <code> (Visual Basic)
- [<example>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/example.md): Learn more about: <example> (Visual Basic)
- [<exception>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/exception.md): Learn more about: <exception> (Visual Basic)
- [<include>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/include.md): Learn more about: <include> (Visual Basic)
- [<list>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/list.md): Learn more about: <list> (Visual Basic)
- [<para>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/para.md): Learn more about: <para> (Visual Basic)
- [<param>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/param.md): Learn more about: <param> (Visual Basic)
- [<paramref>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/paramref.md): Learn more about: <paramref> (Visual Basic)
- [<permission>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/permission.md): Learn more about: <permission> (Visual Basic)
- [<remarks>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xmldoc/remarks.md): Learn more about: <remarks> (Visual Basic)
